Activity: Arrive at the office. Respond to emails. Get a coffee.
Begin developing initial statistical arbitrage trading strategies. Start with a simple pairs trading strategy based on the correlations identified in dataset A and B. Focus on mean reversion.

Refine the trading strategy based on the backtesting results. Adjust parameters such as entry and exit thresholds, stop-loss levels, and position sizing. Rerun backtests.
